CustomField.formula: Total_Basic_Cost__c + Total_Plus_Cost__c + Total_Premier_Cost__c + Total_RV_Cost__c + Total_Other_Cost__c + Total_Basic_Cost_Tax__c + Total_Other_Cost_Tax__c + Total_Plus_Cost_Tax__c + Total_Premier_Cost_Tax__c + Total_RV_Cost_Tax__c + Total_Credit__c - Total_Debit__c
CustomField.label: Total Statement Cost
